paramInformation.label: Basic Set Dim Level (Off)
paramInformation.description: When the flood trigger is off, send this dim level via the Basic CC to Group 2.

paramInformation.label: Basic Set Dim Level (On)
paramInformation.description: When the flood trigger is on, send this dim level via the Basic CC to Group 2.

paramInformation.label: Flood Sensor Function
paramInformation.description: Enable or disable the flood function.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Scale
paramInformation.description: Configure the temperature scale reported by the device.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Report When Triggered
paramInformation.description: Determines whether a temperature report is sent after an event is triggered.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Report When Triggered
paramInformation.description: Determines whether a temperature report is sent after an event is triggered.

paramInformation.label: Basic Off After Flood
paramInformation.description: Determines whether a Basic Off event is sent after a flood event is cleared.

paramInformation.label: Notification Type
paramInformation.description: Determines the type of report sent.

paramInformation.label: Send Multi CC Reports
paramInformation.description: Determines whether a Multi CC report is sent when sending the automatic report.

paramInformation.label: Report Battery State When Triggered
paramInformation.description: Determines whether the battery state is reported when the device is triggered.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Battery Time
paramInformation.description: The time interval upon which to report the battery level.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Temperature Time
paramInformation.description: The time interval upon which to report the temperature.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Humidity Time
paramInformation.description: The time interval upon which to report the humidity.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Flood Time
paramInformation.description: The time interval upon which to report the flood state.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Time Unit
paramInformation.description: Determines the time unit used by parameters 10 & 13-15 (time interval * time unit).

paramInformation.label: Temperature Differential Report
paramInformation.description: Determines the temperature differential that will trigger a report.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Differential Report
paramInformation.description: Determines the humidity differential that will trigger a report.
